name: UpdateProjectProtectionBypass
description:
Update the deployment protection bypass for a Vercel project.

Use this tool to modify the deployment protection automation bypass settings for a specific Vercel project.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The unique Vercel project identifier or project name to update the protection bypass for.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: revoke_automation_bypass
parameters.description: Secret value of the automation bypass to be revoked for a Vercel project.

parameters.name: optional_secret_value
parameters.description: Optional value of the secret to generate; omit for OAuth2 tokens.

value_schema.description: Optional value of the secret to generate, don't send it for oauth2 tokens

parameters.name: create_new_automation_bypass
parameters.description: Create a new automation bypass after revoking the current secret.

value_schema.description: Whether or not a new automation bypass should be created after the provided secret is revoked

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: revoke.regenerate
parameters.description: Whether or not a new automation bypass should be created after the provided secret is revoked

value_schema.description: Whether or not a new automation bypass should be created after the provided secret is revoked

parameters.name: generate.secret
parameters.description: Optional value of the secret to generate, don't send it for oauth2 tokens

value_schema.description: Optional value of the secret to generate, don't send it for oauth2 tokens
